description:
The President of the student council. Furan is very strict when it comes to Maken-ki`s duties that need to be carried out. She often scolds Haruko for coming late (mostly because of Takeru), providing a bad role-model for the other students as Vice-President of the student council.
Despite her shyness around boys she`s very attracted to Akaya from Venus, whom she falls for at their first meeting because unlike the peeping squads around he appears like a gentleman.
name: Takaki Furan
